Name: Red Neck
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Aromatic and not too sweet - the flavour of the Scotch shines through.
History: Created by Sylvain Solignac in 2002 at Circus Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Red Neck contains 261 calories
